com.peterverzijl.softwaresystems.qwirkle.networking

Class GameServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.peterverzijl.softwaresystems.qwirkle.networking.GameServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Server

    public class GameServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Server
    Handles a single game on the server, with a certain amount of players.
    Version:
    1.0a
    Author:
    Peter Verzijl

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameServer

        public GameServer(int targetPlayerCount,
                  LobbyServer lobbyServer)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        targetPlayerCount - The amount of wanted players on this server.
        lobbyServer - The lobby server that this game server belongs to. This value is used to return clients to the lobby upon exit.
